about.tagline: Learn to Code, Grow Together, Conquer the Future! ðŸš€
about.shortIntro: We are the official campus body of GFG, helping students develop coding skills, prepare for competitions, and connect with the tech world.
about.vision: Building a strong coding culture in our college to prepare every student for the tech industry and connect them with industry experts
about.mission: Providing students with practical coding skills, competitive programming, interview preparation, and industry connections through hands-on workshops, real-world projects, and collaborative learning environment
about.history: Our GeeksforGeeks Campus Body was established in September 2024. What initially started with 20 enthusiastic students has now grown into a strong community of 500+ active members. Our chapter's goal is to make every student successful in the coding field and provide them with industry-ready skills.
whatWeDo: Weekly Coding Workshops (DSA, Web Dev, Mobile Dev)
Competitive Programming Sessions and Contest Training
Technical Interview Preparation and Mock Interviews
Industry Expert Guest Lectures and Mentorship
Career Guidance and Resume Building Workshops

team.name: Ankit Kumar
team.description: Leading the chapter with passion for competitive programming and community building. Spearheading initiatives to connect students with industry opportunities.

team.name: Priya Sharma
team.description: Technical lead handling workshop organization, curriculum development, and technical content creation for our learning programs.

team.name: Rohit Agarwal
team.description: Expert in event management, coordinating hackathons, contests, and guest lectures. Building connections with industry professionals.

team.name: Sneha Verma
team.description: Competitive programming expert leading DSA sessions, contest preparations, and guiding students for coding competitions.

team.name: Arjun Patel
team.description: Managing chapter's digital presence, student outreach, and community engagement across all social media platforms.

events.title: Web Development Bootcamp 2025
events.description: 3-day intensive bootcamp covering React, Node.js, MongoDB, and modern web development practices. Hands-on projects and real-world applications with industry experts.

events.title: AI/ML Workshop Series
events.description: Python, Machine Learning algorithms, and practical AI applications focused comprehensive workshop series.

events.title: CodeFest 2024 - Annual Hackathon
events.description: 24-hour coding marathon with industry mentors, exciting prizes worth 50K+, aur real-world problem solving challenges.

events.title: DSA Masterclass Series - Batch 2
events.description: Comprehensive Data Structures and Algorithms masterclass series with competitive programming focus and interview preparation.
events.outcome: 85% students showed significant improvement in problem-solving skills

events.title: Industry Expert Session - Google Engineer
events.description: Exclusive session with Google software engineer on 'Career in Tech Giants' and real industry insights.

speaker.name: Rahul Singh
speaker.experience: 5+ years at Google, Previously at Microsoft

events.title: Chapter Launch Event - GFG GITAM
events.description: Official launch event of GeeksforGeeks Campus Chapter at GITAM University with inaugural ceremony aur future roadmap presentation.
events.outcome: Successfully established chapter with 80+ founding members

achievements.title: Best Campus Chapter Award 2024
achievements.description: Officially recognized by GeeksforGeeks as the most active and impactful campus body in North India region for exceptional community building and student engagement.

achievements.title: CodeFest 2024 - Record Breaking Participation
achievements.description: Successfully organized our flagship hackathon with 85+ participants, 15 teams, and â‚¹50,000+ prize pool. Judging panel and live mentoring with industry experts.

achievements.title: Inter-College Hackathon Winners
achievements.description: Our campus body team members achieved first place in regional inter-college hackathon with innovative AI-powered campus management solution.
achievements.project: Smart Campus Management System using AI/ML

achievements.title: 500+ Member Milestone
achievements.description: Chapter membership crossed 500+ active students mark within 8 months of establishment, making it one of the fastest growing GFG Campus Bodies in India.

achievements.title: Industry Partnership Success
achievements.description: Successfully established partnerships with 5+ tech companies for placements, internships, aur guest lectures. 20+ students placed in top companies through chapter connections.

achievements.title: CodeChef Contest Champions
achievements.description: Multiple campus body members consistently ranking in top 100 of CodeChef monthly contests and representing college at national level competitions.

testimonials.name: Ravi Kumar
testimonials.message: GFG Campus Body completely transformed my coding journey. Thanks to the DSA workshops and mock interviews, I got placed at Google!

testimonials.name: Ananya Singh
testimonials.message: The mentor I got through the campus body helped a lot with resume building and interview preparation. I got selected for Microsoft internship!

testimonials.name: Vikash Sharma
testimonials.message: After attending competitive programming sessions, my confidence level increased. I got top 10 rank in CodeChef contest!
